I'm thinking we need to demote a few of our admins for inactivity. I know that people have School, but that doesn't mean they should be completely useless for most of the year. What are your opinions on this? For the few admins that check this... :P

Edit: I'd like to point out, I'm only suggesting demotions for those that are inactive on the servers  and  the forums.

Mainly talking about DethSlayr, Chopper, Overclocking and possibly Balenti. Not sure about Balenti, he's active at times but doesn't do much. I also think promoting Playerhata to admin would be a good idea.

Edit2: Opening up TTT apps would also be a good idea if we demote these people, or even checking over some already denied applications that were denied with the only reason being we didn't need more at the times they were on.
